content.title: Conversation
table: Behrad: I want something sweet after dinner.
بهراد: من بعد از شام یک چیز شیرین می‌خواهم.
Mahsa: What exactly do you want?
Mahsa: What kind of dessert do you want?
Behrad: I like apple pie a lot.
بهراد: من پای سیب خیلی دوست دارم.
مهسا: من هم آن را خیلی دوست دارم.

content.title: Common Phrases
table: I'd like to have cream on top of my cake.
That big cake looks very tempting.
آن کیک بزرگ خیلی وسوسه انگیز است.
We have a large collection of pastries.
انواع زیادی از شیرینی‌ها را داریم.

content.title: Reading
content.description: The weather in Sweden is very varied. In spring and summer the climate in southern and central Sweden is warm and sunny. In the northern part of Sweden, the climate is colder and more pleasant. Autumn is beautiful in most parts of Sweden. In winter the northern half of the country is cold and covered by snow, while the sourthern half is rainy and slightly warmer.
